name: Cool Gray Wireframe Kit
description:
Wireframe kit with variants and auto layouts.


Cool Gray Wireframe Kit is a library with ready to use Figma components for wireframing:

  • With variants to easily switch between states.
  • Auto layouts and resizable features to adapt to different screen sizes
  • Interchangeable icons


Credits

Created by Ramses Moreno

www.ramsesmoreno.com


Release notes

0.11 2021-08-22

  • New component: Slider
  • Fix: Brand icons now scale correctly

0.10 2021-08-02

  • New varian for menu item: Side

0.9 2021-08-01

  • New component: Item with icon
  • Media components renamed to content

0.8 2021-08-01

  • New component: Stepper: Resizable, with number of steps and current active step selector.

0.7 2021-07-30

  • Login screen samples

0.6 2021-07-30

  • New component: profile-menu
  • Menu items and menus components using a generic icon placeholder
  • Corrections on responsiveness of input and dropdown components

0.5 2021-07-25

  • Reorganized icons

0.4 2021-07-25

  • Added more Font Awesome Brand icons


Icons

Includes Material icons and Font Awesome brand icons with the following licenses:

  • Material design
  • Fontawesome
